subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Swimming
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: A view of the day in sports, with play at Wimbledon, the United States Olympic swimming trials in Omaha and a celebration of the Heat’s N.B.A. championship.
